trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref> events.
The WebPartEventArgs class contains information for several different Web Parts events.

These events include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> events.
The WebPartEventArgs class provides access to the Web Parts control involved in the event.
The Web Parts control is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs.WebPart%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or server or user control) involved in the event.
Gets the Web Parts control involved in the event.

A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> involved in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref> event.
